overview.en: ARCC focuses on improving the traceability and transparency of agricultural value chain, maintaining market order, helping enterprises and project parties to obtain funds to expand reproduction, data analysis and optimization of production chain, innovation of agricultural production technology, and increase production capacity. Create a more sound food safety system, higher transaction efficiency, faster resource flow, less waste of resources and stronger fraud defense. Effectively safeguard the rights and interests of enterprises, farmers and consumers, and build an all-round, highly credible agricultural circulation system.
overview.zh: ARCC着力改善农业价值链的可追溯性与透明度， 维持市场秩序，帮助企业、项目方获得资金扩大再生产，数据分析优化生产链，创新农业生产技术，提高产能。打造更健全的食品安全体系、更高的交易效率、更快的资源流通、更少的资源浪费及更强的欺诈防御。切实保障企业、农户、消费者权益，搭建全方位、具有高公信力的农业流通体系。
